TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Faustin-Archange_Touadéra, title = Faustin-Archange_Touadéra, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faustin-Archange_Touadéra} }

S.FORM: I 1957 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 21 a romi'ad masofoc ci Faustin-Archange Touadéra , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Central african republic anini i ci Faustin-Archange Touadéra, patirengan a romi'ad i 2016 a miheca saka 3 folad saka 30 a romi'ad.

I 1957 a miheca saka 4 folad saka 21 a romi'ad masofoc ci Faostin-Archange Tooadéra , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Central african repoblic anini i ci Faostin-Archange Tooadéra, patirengan a romi'ad i 2016 a miheca saka 3 folad saka 30 a romi'ad.
